entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -31.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
